001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.insertion;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.annotations.InsertionField;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
005import io.cyborgcode.utilities.reflections.ReflectionUtil;
006import org.openqa.selenium.By;
007import org.openqa.selenium.support.FindBy;
008
009import static io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.config.UiConfigHolder.getUiConfig;
010
011/**
012 * Service implementation for processing fields annotated with {@link InsertionField}.
013 *
014 * <p>This class inspects the {@code InsertionField} annotation on object fields,
015 * builds the appropriate Selenium {@link By} locator, determines the target
016 * {@link ComponentType} enum, and delegates to the registered insertion service
017 * to insert values into the UI component.
018 *
019 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
020 */
021public class InsertionServiceFieldImpl extends BaseInsertionService<InsertionField> {
022
023   /**
024    * Constructs an instance of {@code InsertionServiceFieldImpl}.
025    *
026    * @param serviceRegistry The registry that maintains the mapping between component types and insertion services.
027    */
028   public InsertionServiceFieldImpl(final InsertionServiceRegistry serviceRegistry) {
029      super(serviceRegistry);
030   }
031
032   /**
033    * Returns the annotation class that this service handles ({@link InsertionField}).
034    *
035    * @return the {@link InsertionField} class
036    */
037   @Override
038   protected Class<InsertionField> getAnnotationClass() {
039      return InsertionField.class;
040   }
041
042   /**
043    * Returns the processing order defined by the annotation.
044    *
045    * @param annotation the {@link InsertionField} annotation instance
046    * @return the order value indicating insertion priority
047    */
048   @Override
049   protected int getOrder(final InsertionField annotation) {
050      return annotation.order();
051   }
052
053   /**
054    * Retrieves the enum class implementing {@link ComponentType} from the annotation.
055    *
056    * @param annotation the {@link InsertionField} annotation instance
057    * @return the {@code Class} object of the ComponentType enum specified in the annotation
058    */
059   @Override
060   protected Class<? extends ComponentType> getComponentTypeEnumClass(final InsertionField annotation) {
061      return annotation.type();
062   }
063
064   /**
065    * Builds a Selenium {@link By} locator using the annotation's locator definition.
066    *
067    * @param annotation the {@link InsertionField} annotation containing locator info
068    * @return a {@link By} locator for finding the UI element
069    */
070   @Override
071   protected By buildLocator(final InsertionField annotation) {
072      return new FindBy.FindByBuilder().buildIt(annotation.locator(), null);
073   }
074
075   /**
076    * Resolves the {@link ComponentType} enum constant based on annotation's componentType name.
077    *
078    * <p>Uses reflection to find the enum constant within the specified type class and project package.
079    *
080    * @param annotation the {@link InsertionField} annotation instance
081    * @return the {@link ComponentType} constant to use for insertion
082    */
083   @Override
084   protected ComponentType getType(final InsertionField annotation) {
085      final String componentTypeEnumName = annotation.componentType();
086      final Class<? extends ComponentType> typeClass = annotation.type();
087      return ReflectionUtil.findEnumImplementationsOfInterface(
088            typeClass, componentTypeEnumName, getUiConfig().projectPackages()
089      );
090   }
091
092}
